title: A discourse of artificial beauty, in point of conscience between two ladies with some satyrical censures on the vulgar errors of these times.
author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
notes: Written by John Gauden. This is a later ed. of Discourse of auxiliary beauty, which has been attributed to both Gauden and J. Taylor. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
